content.query:
with cte as (SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(value, '$.product_id') AS product_id
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsglobalaayush.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsecontainer/products.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
    cross apply openjson (doc))
select APPROX_COUNT_DISTINCT(product_id) from cte;
